article:
'The Search' may refer to:

In 'film' and 'television':

* [[The Search]], a 1948 film directed by Fred Zinnemann and starring
  Montgomery Clift
* ''The Search'' (TV series), a British contest
* "The Search" (''DS9'' episode), Star Trek: Deep Space 9 episode
* "The Search", third episode of the 1965 Doctor Who serial [[The Space
  Museum#Doctor Who episode head|The Space Museum]]
* "The Search", fifteenth episode of the seventh season of the U.S. version of
  The Office.

In 'books':

* ''The Search'' (novel), by Nobel Prize-winning author Naguib Mahfouz
* The Search, a novel by C. P. Snow
* [[The Search: How Google and Its Rivals Rewrote the Rules of Business and
  Transformed Our Culture]], by John Battelle
* The Search, a novel by Nora Roberts *[[Avatar: The Last Airbender â The
  Search]], a graphic novel planned for 2013

In 'music':

* [[The Search: 1985-1989]], retrospective CD from American hardcore
  punk band Bold
* ''The Search'' (album), by alt-country band Son Volt
* "The Search", a song by the Cherry Poppin' Daddies off their album [[Rapid
  City Muscle Car]]
